message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to sell you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $90. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking to spend $90, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105. I think you'll really get a great deal at this price.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  I'm still hoping to get closer to $95.  How about we split the difference and I pay $97.50?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm not willing to go all the way to $97.50, but I'm willing to meet you at $107.50. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
